data.name: Hand of Fate 2 Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Composed and produced by Jeff van Dyck
Vocals by Angela van Dyck and Ella van Dyck
Guitar, Lute, Dulcimer and Mandolin by Shaun Trainer
Mastered by Dave Neil

01 Hand of Fate II (The Beginning)
02 The Game We Play
03 Deal of the Next Millennia
04 Voice of the Sun
05 Spiritual Rancor
06 Outer Demons
07 Broken
08 Return to the Game
09 Another Devil
10 Wayward Path
11 Until Midnight
12 Hero’s Battle
13 Deep Conflict
14 Tempus
15 Bad Hand
16 Kneel and Fray
17 Surly Towers
18 Space Canoe
19 Hand Over Your Lute
20 Doomhammer
21 Sisters of Murky
22 Lucidity Redux
23 Hand of Fate II
24 Morning Mist
25 The Defiant Ones
26 Violent Elephant
27 Mind Chamber
28 Resistance of the Path
29 Wheel of Fate
30 Giant Moon
31 Dark Sword
32 Effect and Cause
33 Fatal Hand
34 Till We Meet Again

data.short_description: The Hand of Fate 2 Soundtrack features nearly 2 hours of music composed and produced by the award winning Jeff van Dyck.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/7/8/8.1/Vista (32 or 64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.4ghz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600, NVIDIA GeForce GT 630, Radeon HD 5670
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/7/8/8.1/Vista (32 or 64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.4ghz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600, NVIDIA GeForce GT 630, Radeon HD 5670

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.5 or higher
  • Processor: 2.4GHz Intel Core i5
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.5 or higher
  • Processor: 2.4GHz Intel Core i5

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Processor: 2.4ghz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Processor: 2.4ghz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
